% Professional Resume LaTeX Template
% Generated by Resume Builder Backend

\documentclass[11pt,a4paper]{article}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{fontawesome}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{parskip}

% Page setup
\geometry{
    top=0.75in,
    bottom=0.75in,
    left=0.75in,
    right=0.75in
}

% Color scheme
\definecolor{primary}{RGB}{51, 122, 183}
\definecolor{secondary}{RGB}{68, 68, 68}
\definecolor{lightgray}{RGB}{245, 245, 245}

% Custom commands
\newcommand{\sectionheader}[1]{
    \vspace{0.5em}
    \textcolor{primary}{\large\textbf{#1}}
    \vspace{0.25em}
    \hrule height 0.5pt
    \vspace{0.5em}
}

\newcommand{\entry}[4]{
    \textbf{#1} \hfill \textcolor{secondary}{#2} \\
    \textit{#3} \hfill \textcolor{secondary}{#4}
}

\newcommand{\skill}[1]{
    \textbf{#1}
}

% Remove page numbers
\pagestyle{empty}

% Hyperref setup
\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,
    urlcolor=primary,
    linkcolor=primary
}

\begin{document}

% Header section
\begin{center}
    \Huge\textcolor{primary}{\textbf{{{ fullName }}}}
    
    \vspace{0.5em}
    
    % Contact information
    {% if contact %}
    \begin{tabular}{c}
        {% for contact_item in contact %}
        {% if contact_item.type.lower() == 'email' %}
        \faEnvelope\ \href{mailto:{{ contact_item.value }}}{{{ contact_item.value }}} \\
        {% elif contact_item.type.lower() == 'phone' %}
        \faPhone\ {{ contact_item.value }} \\
        {% elif contact_item.type.lower() == 'linkedin' %}
        \faLinkedin\ \href{{{ contact_item.value }}}{LinkedIn} \\
        {% elif contact_item.type.lower() == 'github' %}
        \faGithub\ \href{{{ contact_item.value }}}{GitHub} \\
        {% else %}
        {{ contact_item.type }}: {{ contact_item.value }} \\
        {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
    \end{tabular}
    {% endif %}
\end{center}

\vspace{1em}

% About Me section
{% if aboutMe %}
\sectionheader{About Me}
{{ aboutMe }}

\vspace{0.5em}
{% endif %}

% Experience section
{% if experience %}
\sectionheader{Professional Experience}

{% for exp in experience %}
\noindent\textbf{{{ exp.title }}} \hfill \textcolor{secondary}{{{ exp.startDate }} -- {{ exp.endDate }}}
\noindent\textit{{{ exp.company }}}

\vspace{0.25em}

{% if exp.description %}
{{ exp.description }}
{% endif %}

{% if exp.keywords %}
\vspace{0.25em}
\textit{Technologies:} {{ exp.keywords | join(', ') }}
{% endif %}

\vspace{0.5em}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

% Education section
{% if education %}
\sectionheader{Education}

{% for edu in education %}
\noindent\textbf{{{ edu.degree }}} \hfill \textcolor{secondary}{{{ edu.startDate }} -- {{ edu.endDate }}}
\noindent\textit{{{ edu.institution }}}

{% if edu.description %}
\vspace{0.25em}
{{ edu.description }}
{% endif %}

\vspace{0.5em}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

% Skills section
{% if skills %}
\sectionheader{Skills}

\noindent
{% for skill in skills %}
\skill{{{ skill }}}{% if not loop.last %}, {% endif %}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

% Custom sections
{% if customSections %}
{% for section in customSections %}
\sectionheader{{{ section.title }}}

{{ section.content }}

\vspace{0.5em}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

\end{document}
